name: BangBang Mobile
tag_list: mobile-optimization, responsive-web-development, mcommerce, innovation, digital-marketing, social-media-marketing, tablet-optimization, reputation-management, innovation-management, digital-marketing-strategy, small-business, emerging-business
overview:
We make websites look great and function perfectly on every device; from desktops to tablets to smartphones. No matter where your customers come from, their experience with your brand will be memorable. Our responsive approach to creating your web presence ensures your site is future-proof, ready for any new device that hits the market.

As innovation managers, we keep an eye out for new services and technologies that may benefit your business then build out custom marketing strategies for your business. From developing and executing social marketing strategies to managing QR Codes and augmented reality, we are the small business owner’s digital marketing department giving them the freedom to focus on what really matters - their business and their customers.
